entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as expressing a preference for being at Hogwarts over going back to the Dursleys.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and a wizard. He is described as gloomy and having a dark look on his face when talking about the Dursleys.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's Muggle relatives who treat him poorly. They are mentioned as being bad by Sirius.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family and a kind person. She is mentioned as calling out to Harry and Sirius to hurry up.

entities.name: harry's godfather
entities.description: Harry's godfather is Sirius. He is mentioned as being able to restore his skin to normal after getting a bad bite from a silver snuffbox.
